structure.unit: RIGHTS OF ACTION AND SURVIVAL OF ACTIONS

law.catch_line: Administrative regulations to implement vehicle owner identification system.

text.section: The Transportation Cabinet shall promulgate administrative regulations to implement a system by which a retailer or association of retailers may obtain the name and mailing address of any owner who has been identified as committing an offense under KRS 411.402. The cabinet may enter into an agreement with a retailer or association of retailers to establish a set fee or other negotiated terms for the release of owner records.

Any information released by the cabinet under this section shall be consistent with its authority under KRS 187.310 and shall be in compliance with 18 U.S.C. secs. 2721 et seq. The cabinet may integrate any system established under KRS 411.400 to 411.406 with its existing programs for the release of information pursuant to KRS Chapter 187.

law.history: Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 4, effective July 15, 2008.
